ch.supertomcat.bh.settings

Class ProxyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.supertomcat.bh.settings.ProxyManager

  • public class ProxyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which provides method to get a preconfigured HttpClient, so that in the hole program the proxysettings can be used.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIRECT_CONNECTION
      Direct connection
      static int HTTP_PROXY
      Connection over a proxy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.http.client.HttpClient getHTTPClient()
      Returns a preconfigured HttpClient
      int getMode()
      Returns the mode
      org.apache.http.client.HttpClient getNonMultithreadedHTTPClient()
      Returns a preconfigured HttpClient, but without usage of the Mutli Threaded Connection Manager I need this, because of some problems on download and import html files.
